personal_info.name: Hue Nguyen Thi
personal_info.title: QA Engineer
personal_info.summary: Experienced QA Engineer with 3+ years of expertise in manual and automated testing. Proven track record in developing comprehensive test strategies, implementing automation frameworks, and ensuring high-quality software delivery.

work_experience.description: Lead QA initiatives for enterprise-level applications, managing end-to-end testing processes and mentoring junior team members. Implemented automated testing frameworks that reduced testing time by 60%.
achievements: Reduced critical bugs in production by 85% through comprehensive testing strategies
Implemented automated regression testing suite covering 90% of core functionalities
Led cross-functional team of 5 QA engineers across multiple projects
Established CI/CD pipeline integration reducing deployment time by 40%
Mentored 3 junior QA engineers, with 2 receiving promotions within 18 months
responsibilities: Design and execute comprehensive test plans for web and mobile applications
Develop and maintain automated test scripts using Selenium and TestNG
Perform API testing and integration testing using Postman and REST Assured
Collaborate with development teams in Agile/Scrum environment
Conduct performance testing and load testing using JMeter

work_experience.description: Performed comprehensive testing for web and mobile applications, developed test cases, and collaborated with development teams to ensure quality deliverables.
achievements: Executed 500+ test cases across multiple projects with 98% accuracy
Identified and documented 200+ bugs, improving overall product quality
Reduced testing cycle time by 30% through process optimization
Achieved 100% test coverage for critical user journeys
responsibilities: Execute manual testing for web applications and mobile apps
Create detailed test cases and test scenarios based on requirements
Perform functional, usability, and compatibility testing
Document and track defects using bug tracking tools
Participate in daily standups and sprint planning meetings

work_experience.description: Started career in QA by performing manual testing, learning automation tools, and contributing to quality assurance processes for startup products.
achievements: Successfully completed comprehensive QA training program
Contributed to testing of 3 major product releases
Maintained 95% defect detection rate during UAT phases
responsibilities: Perform manual testing of web applications
Execute smoke testing and regression testing
Document test results and create bug reports
Assist in user acceptance testing coordination
Learn and apply testing best practices

key_achievements.title: Outstanding Testing Performance
key_achievements.description: Achieved 95% accuracy rate in bug detection during training program

key_achievements.title: Comprehensive Test Portfolio
key_achievements.description: Built extensive portfolio with 200+ documented test cases across multiple domains

key_achievements.title: Quality Assurance Excellence
